name: Afrirampo
description: {{nihongo|'''Afrirampo'''|あふりらんぽ|Afuriranpo}} is a band from [[Osaka]], Japan. The band was active from 2002 to 2010 and announced a reform in 2016. The members are Oni (guitar, vocals) and Pikachu (drums, vocals). Afrirampo has toured with [[Sonic Youth]] and [[Lightning Bolt (band)|Lightning Bolt]], played with [[Yoko Ono]] collaborated with [[Acid Mothers Temple]] and released several CDs on various labels.
